title: Grade 5 Mathematics
teaser: Number and Operations in Base Ten, Fractions, Measurement and Data

children.title: Place Value And Decimal Fractions
children.teaser: Students’ understanding of the patterns in the base ten system are extended.

children.title: Multiplicative Patterns On The Place Value Chart
children.teaser: Students explore the multiplicative patterns of the base ten system.

children.title: Reason Concretely And Pictorially Using Place Value
children.teaser: Students reason concretely and pictorially using place value understanding to relate adjacent base ten units from millions to thousandths.

children.title: Reason Abstractly Using Place Value
children.teaser: Students reason abstractly using place value understanding to relate adjacent base ten units from millions to thousandths.

children.title: Use Exponents To Name Place Value Units
children.teaser: Students use exponents to name place value units, and explain patterns in the placement of the decimal point.

children.title: Use Exponents To Denote Powers Of 10
children.teaser: Students use exponents to denote powers of 10 with application to metric conversions.

children.title: Decimal Fractions And Place Value Patterns
children.teaser: Students name and compare decimal fractions in various forms.

children.title: Name Decimal Fractions In Various Forms
children.teaser: Students name decimal fractions in expanded, unit, and word forms by applying place value reasoning.

children.title: Compare Decimal Fractions To The Thousandths
children.teaser: Students compare decimal fractions to the thousandths using like units, and express comparisons with >, <, =.

children.title: Place Value And Rounding Decimal Fractions
children.teaser: Students round decimal numbers to anyplace.

children.title: Rounding Decimals To Any Place
children.teaser: Students round a given decimal to any place using place-value understanding and the vertical-number-line.

children.title: Rounding Decimals To Any Place (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue rounding decimals using place value understanding and the vertical number line.

children.title: Adding And Subtracting Decimals
children.teaser: Connect addition and subtraction of whole numbers to decimal addition and subtraction.

children.title: Add Decimals Using Place Value Strategies
children.teaser: Students add decimals using place value strategies and relate those strategies to a written method.

children.title: Subtracting Decimals Using Place Value
children.teaser: Students subtract decimals using place value strategies and relate those strategies to a written method.

children.title: Multiplying Decimals
children.teaser: Reason about multiplying a decimal by a one-digit whole number.

children.title: Multiply A Decimal Fraction By Single-Digit Whole Numbers
children.teaser: Students multiply a decimal fraction by single-digit whole numbers, relate to a written method through application of the area model and place value understanding, and explain the reasoning used.

children.title: Multiply A Decimal Fraction By Single-Digit Whole Numbers Using Estimation
children.teaser: Students multiply a decimal fraction by single-digit whole numbers, including using estimation to confirm the placement of the decimal point.

children.title: Dividing Decimals
children.teaser: Exploration of division of decimal numbers by one-digit whole-number divisors.

children.title: Divide Decimals By Single-Digit Whole Numbers
children.teaser: Students divide decimals by single-digit whole numbers involving easily identifiable multiples using place value understanding and relate to a written method.

children.title: Divide Decimals With Remainders Using Place Value
children.teaser: Students divide decimals with a remainder using place value understanding and relate to a written method.

children.title: Divide Decimals Using Place Value, Including Remainders
children.teaser: Students divide decimals using place value understanding including remainders in the smallest unit.

children.title: Solve Word Problems Using Decimal Operations
children.teaser: Students solve word problems using decimal operations.

children.title: Multi-Digit Whole Number And Decimal Fraction Operations
children.teaser: Students apply patterns of the base ten system to mental strategies.

children.title: Mental Strategies For Multi-Digit Whole Number Multiplication
children.teaser: Students use place value disks to model multi-digit multiplication.

children.title: Multiply Multi-Digit Whole Numbers
children.teaser: Students multiply multi-digit whole numbers and multiples of 10 using place value patterns and the distributive and associative properties.

children.title: Estimate Multi-Digit-Products By Rounding
children.teaser: Students estimate multi-digit products by rounding factors to a basic fact through place value patterns.

children.title: The Standard Algorithm For Multi-Digit Whole Number Multiplication
children.teaser: Students use area models to generate and record partial products which are combined within the standard algorithm.

children.title: Write And Interpret Numerical Expressions
children.teaser: Students write and interpret numerical expressions and compare expressions using a visual model.

children.title: Convert Numerical Expressions Into Unit Form
children.teaser: Students convert numerical-expressions into unit form as a mental strategy for multi-digit multiplication.

children.title: Partial Products Of The Standard Algorithm Without Renaming
children.teaser: Students connect visual models and the distributive property to partial products of the standard algorithm without renaming.

children.title: Area Models, Distributive Property, And Partial Products
children.teaser: Students connect area models to partial products of the standard algorithm with renaming.

children.title: Area Models, Distributive Property, And Partial Products (Continued)
children.teaser: Students connect area diagrams and the distributive property to partial products with renaming.

children.title: Multiply Multi-Digit Whole Numbers Using Standard Algorithm And Estimation
children.teaser: Students fluently multiply multi-digit whole numbers using the standard algorithm and using estimation to check for reasonableness of the product.

children.title: Multiply Multi-Digit Whole Numbers Using  Standard Algorithm To Solve Word Problems
children.teaser: Students fluently multiply multi-digit whole numbers using the standard algorithm to solve multistep word problems.

children.title: Decimal Multi-Digit Multiplication
children.teaser: Students multiply decimals using place value to reason about products.

children.title: Multiply Decimal Fractions With Tenths Using Place Value
children.teaser: Students multiply decimal fractions with tenths by multi-digits using place value to record partial products.

children.title: Multiply Decimal Fractions By Multi-Digit Whole Numbers
children.teaser: Students multiply decimal fractions by multi-digit whole numbers through conversion to a whole number problem and reasoning about the placement of the decimal.

children.title: Reason About Whole Number Products Of A Decimal With Hundredths
children.teaser: Students reason about the product of a whole number and a decimal with hundredths using place value understanding and estimation.

children.title: Measurement Word Problems With Whole Number And Decimal Multiplication
children.teaser: Students explore methods for expressing equivalent measures.

children.title: Whole Number Multiplication And Equivalent-Measurements
children.teaser: Students use whole-number multiplication to express equivalent-measurements.

children.title: Fraction And Decimal Multiplication And Equivalent Measurements
children.teaser: Students use fraction and decimal multiplication to express equivalent measurements.

children.title: Word Problems Involving Measurement Conversions
children.teaser: Students solve two-step word problems involving measurement conversions.

children.title: Mental Strategies For Multi-Digit Whole Number Division
children.teaser: Students explore division through place value understanding.

children.title: Divide By 10 Patterns For Multi-Digit Whole Numbers
children.teaser: Students use divide by 10 patterns for multi-digit whole number division.

children.title: Use Basic Facts To Approximate Quotients
children.teaser: Students use basic facts to estimate quotients with two-digit divisors.

children.title: Use Basic Facts To Approximate Quotients (Continued)
children.teaser: Students learn to use basic facts to estimate quotients with two-digit divisors.

children.title: Partial Quotients And Multi-Digit Whole Number Division
children.teaser: Students divide multi-digit dividends by two-digit divisors.

children.title: Divide Two- And Three-Digit Dividends By Multiples Of 10
children.teaser: Students divide two- and three-digit dividends by multiples of 10 with single-digit quotients, and make connections to a written method.

children.title: Divide Two- And Three-Digit Dividends By Two-Digit Divisors
children.teaser: Students divide two- and three-digit dividends by two-digit divisors with single-digit quotients, and make connections to a written method.

children.title: Divide Two- And Three-Digit Dividends By Two-Digit Divisors  (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue with dividing-dividends by two-digit divisors with single-digit quotients making connections to written method.

children.title: Divide Three- And Four-Digit Dividends By Two-Digit Divisors
children.teaser: Students divide three- and four-digit dividends by two-digit divisors resulting in two- and three-digit quotients, reasoning about the decomposition of successive remainders in each place value.

children.title: Divide Three- And Four-Digit Dividends By Two-Digit Divisors (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue dividing dividends by two-digit divisors resulting in multi-digit-quotients, decomposition reasoning of successive remainders.

children.title: Partial Quotients And Multi-Digit Decimal Division
children.teaser: Students explore division of decimals by double-digit divisors.

children.title: Divide Decimal Dividends By Multiples Of 10
children.teaser: Students divide decimal dividends by multiples of 10, reasoning about the placement of the decimal point and making connections to a written method.

children.title: Approximate Decimal Quotients With Two-Digit Divisors
children.teaser: Students use basic facts to approximate decimal quotients with two-digit divisors, reasoning about the placement of the decimal point.

children.title: Divide Decimal Dividends By Two-Digit Divisors, Estimating Quotients
children.teaser: Students divide decimal dividends by two-digit divisors, estimating quotients, reasoning about the placement of the decimal point, and making connections to a written method.

children.title: Divide Decimal Dividends By Two-Digit Divisors, Estimating Quotients (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue to divide decimal, estimate quotients, and reason about the placement of the decimal point.

children.title: Measurement Word-Problems With Multi-Digit Division
children.teaser: Students solve multi-step word problems using multi-digit division.

children.title: Solve Division Word Problems With Group Size Unknown
children.teaser: Students solve division word problems involving multi-digit division with group size unknown and the number of groups unknown.

children.title: Solve Division Word Problems With Group Size Unknown (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue to solve division word problems involving multi-digit division with group size and number unknown.

children.title: Addition And Subtraction Of Fractions
children.teaser: Work with place value units paves the path toward fraction arithmetic.
standards: extend understanding of fraction equivalence and ordering.
use equivalent fractions as a strategy to add and subtract fractions.

children.title: Equivalent Fractions
children.teaser: Students explore equivalent fractions through various models.

children.title: Equivalent Fractions With The Visual Models
children.teaser: Students make equivalent fractions with the number line, the area model, and numbers.

children.title: Sums Of Fractions With Like Denominators
children.teaser: Students make equivalent fractions with sums of fractions with like denominators.

children.title: Making Like Units Pictorially
children.teaser: Students use the familiar rectangular fraction model to add and subtract fractions.

children.title: Add Fractions With Unlike Units
children.teaser: Students add fractions with unlike units using the strategy of creating equivalent fractions.

children.title: Add Fractions
children.teaser: Students add fractions with sums between 1 and 2.

children.title: Subtract Fractions With Unlike Units
children.teaser: Students subtract fractions with unlike units using the strategy of creating equivalent fractions.

children.title: Subtract Fractions
children.teaser: Students subtract fractions from numbers between 1 and 2.

children.title: Solve Two-Step Word Problems
children.teaser: Students solve fraction word problems.

children.title: Making Like Units Numerically
children.teaser: Students develop their skills with solving more complex fraction problems.

children.title: Add And Subtract Fractions From Whole Numbers
children.teaser: Students add fractions to and subtract fractions from whole numbers using equivalence and the number line as strategies.

children.title: Add Fractions Making Like Units Numerically
children.teaser: Students transition between pictorial and abstract representations of like units.

children.title: Add Fractions With Sums Greater Than 2
children.teaser: Students add fractions with sums greater than 2.

children.title: Subtract Fractions Making Like Units Numerically
children.teaser: Students subtract fractions making like units numerically.

children.title: Subtract Fractions Greater Than Or Equal To 1
children.teaser: Students subtract fractions greater than or equal to 1.

children.title: Further Applications
children.teaser: Students strategize to solve multi-term problems.

children.title: Fraction Benchmark Numbers
children.teaser: Students use fraction benchmark numbers to assess reasonableness of addition and subtraction equations.

children.title: Strategize To Solve Multi-Term Problems
children.teaser: Students look for number relationships before calculating.

children.title: Solve Multi-Step Word Problems
children.teaser: Students solve multi-step word problems; assess reasonableness of solutions using benchmark numbers.

children.title: Explore Part To Whole Relationships
children.teaser: Students explore partwhole relationships while solving a challenging problem.

children.title: Multiplication And Division Of Fractions And Decimal Fractions
children.teaser: Students learn to multiply fractions and decimal fractions.

children.title: Line Plots Of Fraction Measurements
children.teaser: Students construct line plots by measuring the same objects using three different rulers.

children.title: Measure And Compare Pencil Lengths
children.teaser: Measure and compare pencil lengths to the nearest 𝟏/𝟐 , 𝟏/𝟒 , and 𝟏/𝟖 of an inch, and analyze the data through line plots.

children.title: Fractions As Division
children.teaser: Students interpret fractions as division.

children.title: Interpret A Fraction As Division
children.teaser: Students interpret a fraction in context as a numerator and denominator.

children.title: Interpret A Fraction As Division (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue to interpret fractions as division.

children.title: Use Tape Diagrams To Model Fractions As Division
children.teaser: Students use tape diagrams to visualize the placement of fractions.

children.title: Word Problems Involving Division Of Whole Numbers
children.teaser: Students solve word problems involving the division of whole numbers with answers in the form of fractions or whole numbers.

children.title: Multiplication Of A Whole Number By A Fraction
children.teaser: Students explore finding a fraction of a set.

children.title: Relate Fractions As Division To Fraction Of A Set
children.teaser: Students explore fraction of a set and conversion of units.

children.title: Multiply Using Tape Diagrams
children.teaser: Students multiply any whole number by a fraction using tape diagrams.

children.title: Repeated Addition Of Fraction Multiplication
children.teaser: Students relate a fraction of a set to the repeated addition interpretation of fraction multiplication.

children.title: Fractions Of Measurements, And Word Problems
children.teaser: Students find a fraction of a measurement, and solve word problems.

children.title: Fraction Expressions And Word Problems
children.teaser: Student interpret numerical expressions with fractions.

children.title: Compare And Evaluate Expressions
children.teaser: Students compare expressions in word and numerical forms and with parenthesis.

children.title: Fraction Word-Problems
children.teaser: Students solve and create fraction word problems involving addition, subtraction, and multiplication.

children.title: Fraction Word-Problems (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue to solve and create fraction word problems involving addition, subtraction, and multiplication.

children.title: Multiplication Of A Fraction By A Fraction
children.teaser: Students multiply fractions by fractions and decimals by decimals.

children.title: Multiply Unit Fractions By Unit Fractions
children.teaser: Students multiply unit fractions by unit fractions.

children.title: Multiply Unit Fractions By Non-Unit Fractions
children.teaser: Students multiply unit fractions by non-unit fractions.

children.title: Multiply Non-Unit Fractions By Non-Unit Fractions
children.teaser: Students multiply non-unit fractions by non-unit fractions.

children.title: Tape Diagrams And Fraction-By-Fraction Multiplication
children.teaser: Students solve word problems using tape diagrams and fraction-by-fraction multiplication.

children.title: Relate Decimal And Fraction-Multiplication
children.teaser: Students relate decimal and fraction multiplication.

children.title: Relate Decimal And Fraction-Multiplication (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue to relate decimal and fraction multiplication.

children.title: Convert Measures Involving Whole Numbers
children.teaser: Students convert measures involving whole numbers, and solve multi-step word problems.

children.title: Convert Mixed Unit Measurements
children.teaser: Students convert mixed unit measurements, and solve multi-step word problems.

children.title: Multiplication With Fractions And Decimals As Scaling And Word Problems
children.teaser: Students extend their understanding of multiplication to include scaling.

children.title: Explain The Size Of The Product, And Relate Fraction And Decimal Equivalence
children.teaser: Students explain the size of the product, and relate fraction and decimal equivalence to multiplying a fraction by 1.

children.title: Compare The Size Of The Product To The Size Of The Factors
children.teaser: Students compare the size of the product to the size of the factors.

children.title: Compare The Size Of The Product To The Size Of The Factors (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue to compare the size of the product to the size of the factors.

children.title: Fraction And Decimal Multiplication
children.teaser: Students solve word problems using fraction and decimal multiplication.

children.title: Division Of Fractions And Decimal Fractions
children.teaser: Students divide fractions by fractions and decimals by decimals.

children.title: Divide A Whole Number By A Unit Fraction
children.teaser: Students divide a whole number by a unit fraction.

children.title: Divide A Unit Fraction By A Whole Number
children.teaser: Students divide a unit fraction by a whole number.

children.title: Fraction Division
children.teaser: Students solve problems involving fraction division.

children.title: Write Equations And Word Problems Using Diagrams
children.teaser: Students write equations and word problems corresponding to tape and number line diagrams.

children.title: Division By A Unit Fraction, By 1 Tenth, 1 Hundredth
children.teaser: Students connect division by a unit fraction to division by 1 tenth and 1 hundredth.

children.title: Divide Decimal Dividends By Non‐Unit Decimal Divisors
children.teaser: Students divide decimal dividends by non‐unit decimal divisors.

children.title: Divide Decimal Dividends By Non‐Unit Decimal Divisors (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue to divide decimal dividends by non‐unit decimal divisors.

children.title: Interpretation Of Numerical Expressions
children.teaser: Students explore numerical expressions involving fraction-by-fraction multiplication.

children.title: Numerical Expressions And Language Of Scaling And Fraction Division
children.teaser: Students interpret and evaluate numerical expressions including the language of scaling and fraction division.

children.title: Story Contexts For Numerical Expressions
children.teaser: Students create story contexts for numerical expressions and tape diagrams, and solve word problems.

children.title: Addition And Multiplication With Volume And Area
children.teaser: Students work with two- and three-dimensional figures.

children.title: Concepts Of Volume
children.teaser: Students explore three dimensions through work with volume.

children.title: Explore Volume By Building
children.teaser: Students explore volume by building with and counting unit cubes.

children.title: Finding Volume Of Right Rectangular Prisms
children.teaser: Students find the volume of a right rectangular prism by packing with cubic units and counting.

children.title: Compose And Decompose Right Rectangular Prisms
children.teaser: Students compose and decompose right rectangular prisms using layers.

children.title: Volume And The Operations Of Multiplication And Addition
children.teaser: Students build concrete understanding of volume and multiplicative reasoning.

children.title: Use Multiplication To Calculate Volume
children.teaser: Students use multiplication to calculate volume.

children.title: Use Multiplication To Connect Packing Volume To Filling Volume
children.teaser: Students use multiplication to connect volume as packing with volume as filling.

children.title: Total Volumes Of Solid Figures Composed Of Two Rectangular Prisms
children.teaser: Students learn about the total volumes of solid figures composed of two non-overlapping rectangular prisms.

children.title: Word Problems Involving Volume Of Rectangular Prisms
children.teaser: Word problems involving volume of rectangular prisms with whole number edge lengths.

children.title: Design A Sculpture Using Rectangular Prisms Within Parameters
children.teaser: Students apply concepts and formulas of volume to design a sculpture using rectangular prisms within parameters.

children.title: Design A Sculpture Using Rectangular Prisms Within Parameters (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue to use volume to design a sculpture using rectangular prisms within parameters.

children.title: Area Of Rectangular Figures With Fractional Side Lengths
children.teaser: Students use rulers and right angle templates to construct and measure rectangles.

children.title: Area Of Rectangles With Whole-By-Mixed And Whole-By-Fractional Number Side Lengths
children.teaser: Students find the area of rectangles with whole-by-mixed and whole-by-fractional number side lengths by tiling, record by drawing, and relate to fraction multiplication.

children.title: Area Of Rectangles With Mixed-By-Mixed And Fraction-By-Fraction Side Lengths
children.teaser: Students find the area of rectangles with mixed-by-mixed and fraction-by-fraction side lengths by tiling, record by drawing, and relate to fraction multiplication.

children.title: Area Of Rectangles With Fractional Side Lengths
children.teaser: Students measure to find the area of rectangles with fractional side lengths.

children.title: Multiplying Mixed Number Factors
children.teaser: Students multiply mixed number factors, and relate to the distributive property and area model.

children.title: Area Of Figures With Fractional Side Lengths
children.teaser: Students solve real-world problems involving area of figures with fractional side lengths using visual models and/or equations.

children.title: Area Of Figures With Fractional Side Lengths (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue solving problems involving area of figures with fractional side lengths.

children.title: Drawing, Analysis, And Classification Of Two-Dimensional Shapes
children.teaser: Students draw two-dimensional shapes to analyze their attributes.

children.title: Draw Trapezoids To Clarify Their Attributes
children.teaser: Students draw and define trapezoids based on those attributes.

children.title: Draw Parallelograms To Clarify Their Defining Attributes
children.teaser: Students draw and define parallelograms based on those attributes.

children.title: Draw Rectangles And Rhombuses To Clarify Their Attributes
children.teaser: Students draw and define rectangles and rhombuses based on those attributes.

children.title: Draw Kites And Squares To Clarify Their Attributes
children.teaser: Students draw and define kites and squares based on those attributes.

children.title: Classify Two-Dimensional Figures
children.teaser: Students classify two-dimensional figures in a hierarchy based on properties.

children.title: Draw And Identify Two-Dimensional Figures
children.teaser: Students draw and identify varied two-dimensional figures from given attributes.

children.title: Problem Solving With The Coordinate Plane
children.teaser: Students solve problems using quadrant one of the coordinate plane.

children.title: Coordinate Systems
children.teaser: Students explore that any line, regardless of orientation, can be made into a number line.

children.title: Coordinate System On A Line
children.teaser: Students construct a coordinate system on a line.

children.title: Coordinate System On A Plane
children.teaser: Students construct a coordinate system on a plane.

children.title: Name And Plot Coordinate Points
children.teaser: Students name points using coordinate pairs, and use the coordinate pairs to plot points.

children.title: Name And Plot Coordinate Points (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue naming points using coordinate pairs.

children.title: Investigate Patterns In Vertical And Horizontal Lines
children.teaser: Students investigate patterns in vertical and horizontal lines, and interpret points on the plane as distances from the axes.

children.title: Investigate Patterns In Vertical And Horizontal Lines (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue to Investigate patterns in vertical and horizontal lines, and interpret points on the plane.

children.title: Patterns In The Coordinate Plane And Graphing Number Patterns From Rules
children.teaser: Students plot points and use them to draw lines in the plane.

children.title: Plot Points And Draw Lines On A Plane
children.teaser: Students plot points, use them to draw lines in the plane, and describe patterns within the coordinate pairs.

children.title: Generate Numbered Patterns From A Given Rule
children.teaser: Students generate a number pattern from a given rule, and plot the points.

children.title: Generate Two Number Patterns From Given Rules
children.teaser: Students generate two number patterns from given rules, plot the points, and analyze the patterns.

children.title: Compare Lines And Patterns
children.teaser: Students compare the lines and patterns generated by addition rules and multiplication rules.

children.title: Analyze Number Patterns
children.teaser: Students analyze number patterns created from mixed operations.

children.title: Create A Rule To Generate A Number Pattern
children.teaser: Students create a rule to generate a number pattern, and plot the points.

children.title: Drawing Figures In The Coordinate Plane
children.teaser: Students draw figures in the coordinate plane by plotting points.

children.title: Construct Parallel Line Segments
children.teaser: Students construct parallel line segments on a rectangular grid.

children.title: Construct Parallel Lines And Analyze Coordinate Pairs
children.teaser: Students construct parallel line segments, and analyze relationships of the coordinate pairs.

children.title: Construct Perpendicular Line Segments
children.teaser: Students construct perpendicular line segments on a rectangular grid.

children.title: Construct Perpendicular Lines And Analyze Coordinate Pairs
children.teaser: Students construct perpendicular line segments, and analyze relationships of the coordinate pairs.

children.title: Draw Symmetric Figures
children.teaser: Students draw symmetric figures using distance and angle measure from the line of symmetry.

children.title: Problem Solving In The Coordinate Plane
children.teaser: Students apply the coordinate plane in the real world.

children.title: Draw Symmetric Figures On The Coordinate Plane
children.teaser: Students draw symmetric figures on the coordinate plane.

children.title: Plot Data And Analyze Trends
children.teaser: Students plot data on line graphs and analyze trends.

children.title: Solve Real World Problems
children.teaser: Students use coordinate systems to solve real world problems.

children.title: Multi-Step Word Problems
children.teaser: Students use all four operations with whole numbers and fractions in varied contexts.

children.title: Solve Complex, Multi-Step Problems (Part 1)
children.teaser: Student make sense of complex, multi-step problems/persevere in solving them.

children.title: Solve Complex, Multi-Step Problems (Part 2)
children.teaser: Students continue making sense of problems and persevere in solving them.

children.title: Solve Complex, Multi-Step Problems (Part 3)
children.teaser: Students continue making sense of complex, multi-step problems and persevere in solving them.

children.title: Solve Complex, Multi-Step Problems (Part 4)
children.teaser: Students continue making sense of complex, multi-step problems and share/critique peer solutions.

children.title: Solve Complex, Multi-Step Problems (Part 5)
children.teaser: Students make sense of complex, multi-step problems/persevere in solving them. Share and critique peer-solutions.

children.title: Writing And Interpreting Numerical Expressions
children.teaser: Students solidify writing and interpreting numerical expressions.

children.title: The Years In Review:  A Reflection On A Story Of Units
children.teaser: Students spend time producing a compendium of their learning.

children.title: Writing And Interpreting Numerical Expressions (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue to solidify writing and interpreting numerical expressions.

children.title: Solidify Fluency
children.teaser: Students solidify fluency with Grade 5 skills.

children.title: Vocabulary Of Geometry
children.teaser: Student solidify the vocabulary of geometry.

children.title: Vocabulary Of Geometry (Continued)
children.teaser: Students solidify the vocabulary of geometry.

children.title: Fibonacci Sequence
children.teaser: Students explore the Fibonacci sequence.

children.title: Patterns In Saving Money
children.teaser: Students explore patterns in saving money.

children.title: Design And Construct Boxes
children.teaser: Students design and construct boxes to house materials for summer use.

children.title: Design And Construct Boxes (Continued)
children.teaser: Students continue designing and constructing boxes to house materials for summer use.
